FuncDef: The display mld snooping group command displays multicast group information dynamically learned on a specified interface. The display mld snooping group command displays multicast group information dynamically learned on a specified interface. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display mld snooping group interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } vlan <vlan-id> [ [ source-address <source-address> ] group-address <group-address> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays dynamically learned multicast group information of a specified interface.
-

Displays dynamically learned multicast group information of a specified VLAN.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4063.

Displays dynamically learned information about a multicast group to which a specified multicast source sends data.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Displays dynamically learned information about a specified multicast group.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number in X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X format. The value ranges from FF00:: to FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF.

Displays dynamically learned multicast group information of a specified interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mld snooping group interface 10ge 1/0/1 vlan 2 source-address 2001:db8:1::1 group-address ff33::1
